Oct. 5, 2013 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Third Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-third-section
None
Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Richard Killen, Eb Bass (City of Cardiff) Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 7 bands competed.
Oct. 6, 2013, 2:35 p.m. July 4, 2020, 12:26 p.m.
1 Melingriffith 2 Band Gareth Ritter Purcell Variations [Downie]
2 Abertillery & District Youth Dean Evans Valerius Variations
3 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Alan Gibbs Triptych [Sparke]
4 Upper Rhondda Brass Band Gareth Robinson A Saddleworth Festival Overture
5 Oakdale Silver Band Mike Davies A Malvern Suite
6 Ystradgynlais Public Band Alex Parker A Wessex Suite
7 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Alice Jones The Dark Side of the Moon
